panels.description: The HTTP request rate for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(app, job, instance) (rate(windows_iis_worker_requests_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Requests

panels.description: Requests that have resulted in errors for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(app, instance, job, status_code) (rate(windows_iis_worker_request_errors_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Request errors

panels.description: The number of attempted websocket connections for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(app, instance, job) (increase(windows_iis_worker_websocket_connection_attempts_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]))

panels.title: Websocket connection attempts

panels.description: The success rate of websocket connection attempts for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(app, job, instance) (increase(windows_iis_worker_websocket_connection_accepted_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]) / clamp_min(increase(windows_iis_worker_websocket_connection_attempts_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]),1)) * 100

panels.title: Websocket connection success rate

panels.description: The current number of worker threads processing requests for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(app, instance, job, state) (windows_iis_worker_threads{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"})

panels.title: Current worker threads

panels.description: The current application thread pool utilization for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by (job, instance, app) (windows_iis_worker_threads{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"})/ clamp_min(sum by (job, instance, app) (windows_iis_worker_max_threads{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}),1) * 100

panels.title: Thread pool utilization

panels.description: The current number of worker processes processing requests for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(app, job, instance) (windows_iis_current_worker_processes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"})

panels.title: Current worker processes

panels.description: The number of worker process failures for an IIS application.
panels.title: Worker process failures

panels.description: The number of worker process startup failures for an IIS application.
panels.title: Worker process startup failures

panels.description: The number of worker process shutdown failures for an IIS application.
panels.title: Worker process shutdown failures

panels.description: The number of worker process ping failures for an IIS application.
panels.title: Worker process ping failures

panels.description: The current file cache hit ratio for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(job, instance, app) (increase(windows_iis_worker_file_cache_hits_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]) / clamp_min(increase(windows_iis_worker_file_cache_queries_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]),1)) * 100

panels.title: File cache hit ratio

panels.description: The current URI cache hit ratio for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(instance, job, app) (increase(windows_iis_worker_uri_cache_hits_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]) / clamp_min(increase(windows_iis_worker_uri_cache_queries_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]),1)) * 100

panels.title: URI cache hit ratio

panels.description: The current metadata cache hit ratio for an IIS site.

targets.expr: sum by(job, instance, app)(increase(windows_iis_worker_metadata_cache_hits_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]) / clamp_min(increase(windows_iis_worker_metadata_cache_queries_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]),1)) * 100

panels.title: Metadata cache hit ratio

panels.description: The current output cache hit ratio for an IIS application.

targets.expr: sum by(job, instance, app) (increase(windows_iis_worker_output_cache_hits_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]) / clamp_min(increase(windows_iis_worker_output_queries_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", app=~"$application"}[$__interval:]),1))

panels.title: Output cache hit ratio
